General.Name: Menang Corporation (Malaysia) Bhd
General.Description: Menang Corporation (M) Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development, construction, and government development projects activities in Malaysia. The company operates through three segments: Property Development, Investment Holding, and Concession Arrangements. It develops residential and commercial properties. The company is also involved in the money lending; provision of management services; and construction and maintenance of facilities and infrastructure. In addition, it engages in landscaping and turf farming, and leasing and hire purchase activities. The company was incorporated in 1964 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
General.Address: Wisma Selangor Dredging, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 50450
